definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

pinyin: mi4 bi4 shi4 xun2 huan2 zai4 hu1 xi1 shui3 fei4 xi4 tong3
containing_words.word: 密閉式循環再呼吸水肺系統

sentences.english: High crosslink starch nearly didn't dissolve in boiled water and could sop up more water.
sentences.chinese: 高交聯澱粉溶解性能降低，而吸水性能增強。

sentences.english: Have, if applicable, a smooth non-absorbent ceiling to facilitate cleaning;
sentences.chinese: 天花板應光滑不滲吸水，以便於清潔和衛生。

sentences.english: The hydroscopicity of plastic was significantly increased by glycerol monostearate or sodium stearoyl lactylate (SSL), but decreased by higher dosage of calcium stearoyl lactylate (CSL).
sentences.chinese: 而較高添加量的硬脂酰乳酸鈣降低了塑料的吸水率。

sentences.english: Man should have a spongelike capacity, as for knowledge, etc.
sentences.chinese: 一個人學習的精力應該像海綿吸水的能力。

sentences.english: Effective fabrics softener excellent water absorbency, no yellowing.
sentences.chinese: 非常好的柔軟效果，吸水性佳，不黃變。

sentences.english: Through experiments the good condition for the water-absorbing and water-keeping super absorbent was got.
sentences.chinese: 通過實驗得到了合成該吸水保水劑的適宜條件。

sentences.english: The balanced water absorption increased with rise of environmental temperature.
sentences.chinese: 隨環境溫度的升高，該材料的平衡吸水率增大。

sentences.english: Using polyethylene glycol dimaleate as crosslinking agent, a high water-absorbent resin was synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 用聚乙二醇雙馬來酸酯作交聯劑製備高吸水性樹脂。

sentences.english: The Sponges are put in the stainless steel/plastic tray.
sentences.chinese: 吸水的海綿塊放置在不鏽鋼或塑料托盤內。

sentences.english: On mild days, wear running gloves that wick moisture away.
sentences.chinese: 在溫和的天氣裏，戴着跑步手套可以吸水。

sentences.english: It is characterized with high particle strength and low water absorption.
sentences.chinese: 高強度和低吸水率是其突出特點。

sentences.english: Towels work much better to absorb water when they aren’t coated by fabric softener.
sentences.chinese: 毛巾在不使用柔軟劑的情況下有更好的吸水性。

sentences.english: Degradable super absorbent composite resin was prepared by water solution co-polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 採用水溶液共聚法合成易降解的高吸水性複合樹脂。

sentences.english: The re-absorption occurs in the particle, surface with the deep dewatering lignite.
sentences.chinese: 深度乾燥煤的復吸水主要發生在煤堆表面。

sentences.english: Using antiphase suspension polymerization to synthesize the high hygroscopicity resin.
sentences.chinese: 採用反相懸浮聚合法合成高吸水性樹脂。

definition: sponge (zoology)/sponge (piece of absorbent material, either natural or made from plastic etc)/foam rubber
to adhere to a surface/to absorb/to draw in/(fig.) to attract/(chemistry) adsorption
upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
